products.title: Hive Blackout Green Perfect Fit
products.description: Hive blackout green perfect fit pleated blind. Part of their hive blackout range, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, upvc windows and doors. The "hiveblackout"range has a backing. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords through the fabric. Blackout fabric: yes. Please note, on a perfect fit blind you may get light leakage between the material and frame.

products.title: Powder Green Perfect Fit
products.description: This powder green perfect fit blind, is a combination of their metal venetian blind and perfect fit frame to create an ideal blind for your upvc windows and doors. No screws, no drilling - innovative fixings.

products.title: Mirabella Solar Crush Mint Green Solar/thermal Perfect Fit Pleated Blind
products.description: Their mirabella collection are made from solar fabric. This means they utilize fabric technology that keeps your room warm in winter and cool in summer by absorbing heat from sunlight. This makes them an excellent choice for those who are looking for energy efficient and energy saving blinds. Featured here in their mint green - perfect for those wanting to introduce a bright colour into their room.

products.title: Limewash Gloss Perfect Fit
products.description: A peppier take on their beige-toned blinds, limewash is enhanced by its high-gloss finish, for a gentle shine that gives a clean look to your windows. Fitting snug into the window frame, their perfect fit blinds are the simplest shading solution for conservatories, patio doors and 'tricky' windows like tilt and turns struggling to cover your french doors? Aluminium perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time.

products.title: Splash Vine Green Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Splash vine green a bright and lush green perfect fit roller blind perfect for adding a stylish, modern finish to your home. This light-filtering, dim-out perfect fit blind is the perfect choice whether you are refreshing a tired looking window or moving into a new home.
